resources.string: Your Master Password used for generating MasterKee passwords must be stored inside a special entry in your Keepass2Android database. Please create such an entry and then select it in your database (The current KP2A plugin interface requires this as a 2-step process). After creating and selecting the entry, you will be able to create new entries for sites.
Calculating derived key... This might take a few seconds.
Plugin to generate passwords compatible with the MasterPassword approach by Maarten Billemont giving you the ability to restore passwords even if your database is lost.
